Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.description: Convert results set data and set job description for the workflow job
Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.inputs: <inputs><INP_PAUSE_WF_START class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">false</INP_PAUSE_WF_START><IIIIIIIIIIII class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">false</IIIIIIIIIIII><INP_EMAIL_ID class="java.lang.String" _list_="false"></INP_EMAIL_ID><INP_LOG_EVENT_MESSAGE class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">Start Workflow</INP_LOG_EVENT_MESSAGE><INP_LOG_SEVERITY class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">INFO</INP_LOG_SEVERITY><INP_SEND_EMAIL class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">true</INP_SEND_EMAIL></inputs>
Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.name: WF_RESULT_SETS
Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.variables: <variables><VAR_WORKFLOW_PHASE class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><VAR_PAUSE_STRING class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">.</VAR_PAUSE_STRING><VAR_WF_STATUS class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">COMPLETED</VAR_WF_STATUS><VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><VAR_DATE_STR class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><VAR_OBJECT_LIST class="java.lang.String" _list_="true" /><VAR_DELIMETER_LIST class="java.lang.String" _list_="true" /><VAR_JOB_DESCR1 class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">ResultSetToHTML</VAR_JOB_DESCR1><VAR_JOB_DESCR2 class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">,ResultSetToText,TextToResultSet</VAR_JOB_DESCR2><VAR_JOB_DESCR3 class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">ResultSetToHTML ,ResultSetToText,TextToResultSet</VAR_JOB_DESCR3></variables>

children.displayName: Provide email id for sending report
children.name: INP_EMAIL_ID

children.displayName: Send email reports at the end of Workflow?
children.name: INP_SEND_EMAIL

Activity.description: executes a defined process block within the workflow
Activity.name: ExecuteProcessBlock

Activity.description: creates a super process group
Activity.name: ProcessBlock

Activity.description: executes a set of activities when the workflow completes
Activity.name: OnWorkflowComplete

Activity.description: Ends the workflow
Activity.name: WorkflowEnd

inputs.val: <inputs><INP_EMAIL_ID class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_EMAIL_ID}</INP_EMAIL_ID><INP_STATUS class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_WF_STATUS}</INP_STATUS><INP_JOBID class="java.lang.Integer" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/system/jobId}</INP_JOBID><INP_WORKFLOW_NAME class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/system/workflow/workflowName}</INP_WORKFLOW_NAME><INP_START_TIME class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/system/startTime}</INP_START_TIME><INP_FAILIURE_MESSAGE class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE}</INP_FAILIURE_MESSAGE></inputs>

Activity.description: creates a super process group
Activity.name: ProcessBlock

Activity.description: activity to execute code snippets in the selected language
Activity.name: Script

inputs.val:
<inputs><script language="1" script="logger.info("INFO: pb_status : [" + xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_status} + "]");

if (!xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_status}.equals("COMPLETED"))
{
 workflow.setVariable("VAR_WF_STATUS", "FAILED");
 workflow.setVariable("VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE", xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_failiure_message});
 logger.info("INFO: Setting VAR_WF_STATUS = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_WF_STATUS") + "]");
 logger.info("INFO: Setting VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE") + "]");
}" /></inputs>

<inputs><IIIIIIIIIIII class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/inputs/IIIIIIIIIIII}</IIIIIIIIIIII><INP_EMAIL_ID class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_EMAIL_ID}</INP_EMAIL_ID><INP_PAUSE_WF_START class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_PAUSE_WF_START}</INP_PAUSE_WF_START><INP_LOG_EVENT_MESSAGE class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_LOG_EVENT_MESSAGE}</INP_LOG_EVENT_MESSAGE><INP_LOG_SEVERITY class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_LOG_SEVERITY}</INP_LOG_SEVERITY><INP_SEND_EMAIL class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false" /><INP_CHECK class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">false</INP_CHECK></inputs>

Activity.description: converts a result set to an HTML table
Activity.name: ResultSetToHTML

Activity.description: executes queries against a commcell database
Activity.name: CommServDBQuery

inputs.val: <inputs><commCell /><query>select Top 3 id,name,simOperatingSystemId,net_hostname,client_password,refTime,modified from app_client where name!='NO CLIENT'</query></inputs>

Activity.description: Sends an email to a list of users
Activity.name: Email

inputs.val: <inputs><email class="workflow.types.Email"><from class="java.lang.String" /><to class="java.lang.String">xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_EMAIL_ID}</to><cc class="java.lang.String" /><bcc class="java.lang.String" /><subject class="java.lang.String">ResultSetToHTM L: xpath:{/workflow/system/jobId} : xpath:{/workflow/system/workflow/workflowName} : xpath:{/workflow/system/startTime}</subject><attachments class="java.lang.Object" /><repeatInterval class="java.lang.Integer" /><body class="java.lang.String">ResultsSetToHTML Output : xpath:{/workflow/ResultSetToHTML_1/output}</body><html class="java.lang.Boolean">true</html><replyTo class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /></email></inputs>

Activity.description: creates a super process group
Activity.name: ProcessBlock

onEnter.script: workflow.setVariable("VAR_WORKFLOW_PHASE","PHASE START : [" + xpath:{/workflow/system/jobId} + "][" + xpath:{/workflow/system/workflow/workflowName} + "][" + xpath:{/workflow/system/startTime} +"] : RESULTS SET TO TEXT "); logger.info("INFO: VAR_WORKFLOW_PHASE : [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_WORKFLOW_PHASE") + "]");

Activity.description: iterates a group of activities over a list of values
Activity.name: ForEach

onEnter.script: workflow.setVariable("VAR_WORKFLOW_PHASE","PHASE START : RESULT SET TO TXT"); logger.info("INFO: VAR_WORKFLOW_PHASE : [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_WORKFLOW_PHASE") + "]");

Activity.description: converts a result set to a delimited string
Activity.name: ResultSetToText

Activity.name: AddToList

Activity.name: ExecuteProcessBlock

Activity.name: TextToResultSet

Activity.description: Sends an email to a list of users
Activity.name: Email

inputs.val:
<inputs><email class="workflow.types.Email"><from class="java.lang.String" /><to class="java.lang.String">xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_EMAIL_ID}</to><cc class="java.lang.String" /><bcc class="java.lang.String" /><subject class="java.lang.String">ResultSetToText :  xpath:{/workflow/system/jobId} : xpath:{/workflow/system/workflow/workflowName} : xpath:{/workflow/system/startTime}</subject><attachments class="java.lang.Object" /><repeatInterval class="java.lang.Integer" /><body class="java.lang.String"><div>
      <b><u>DELIMETER : </u></b>xpath:{/workflow/ForEach_1/VAR_DELIMETER_LIST}
    </div>
    <div>
      
    </div>
    <div>
      <b><u>RESULTSSET TO TEXT:</u></b>
    </div>
    <div>
      
    </div>
    <div>
      xpath:{/workflow/ResultSetToText_1/output}<br>
    </div></body><html class="java.lang.Boolean">true</html><replyTo class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /></email></inputs>

onExit.script: String temp = xpath:{/workflow/CommServDBQuery_3/resultSets/row/col[1]}; logger.info("INFO: Result for Query : [" + temp + "]");

inputs.val: <inputs><commCell /><query>select jobDescription from JMJobInfo where jobId='xpath:{/workflow/system/jobId}' and jobDescription='xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_JOB_DESCR1}'</query></inputs>
